name: Onion (DanielSour) (DanielSour)
description:
Just for LCJ4 judges to know, this is a different idea than last year. I know that they are the same characters, but it uses a different engine, different sprites, different music, and different way to play.

Enter = Start

Arrow Keys = Moving

Story: Knife is destroying the world, so you have to save the world with apples. Some onions got possessed and turned purple.
